it s one of my favorite hobbies.

participant_2.background:
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
i wait for something interesting to happen each day.
My weight is 160 pounds.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing this fine day?
Hey there! I'm doing okay, just waiting for the weekend to start. How about yourself?
I'm doing well, just got home from work. I'm a warehouse worker.
Oh, cool! I'm a musician. I practice my guitar for hours every day.
That's awesome! I love to play guitar too, but I'm not very good.
Don't worry, everyone starts out somewhere! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into blues and rock.
Nice! I love blues and rock too. What's your favorite song to play?
I don't know if I have a favorite song, but I really like to play "Stairway to Heaven" by Led Zeppelin.
That's a great song! I love playing that one too.
Me too! It's so much fun to play.
I'm glad you like it! I'm always looking for new people to play music with. Would you like to jam sometime?
Sure, that would be fun! I'd love to jam with you.
Awesome! I'll send you a message later and we can set up a time to get together.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it.
